projects.project_name: Laterite road and single pipe culvert project

ProjectSummary.Name: Laterite road and single pipe culvert project
ProjectSummary.Objective: The people are easier and faster to travel and transport the products to the target point.

Outputs_Estimated_Cost.Description: Laterite road Upgrade [ 1010102 ]Dimension #1 : 5.000 Width (m)Dimension #2 : 4,173.000 Volume of earth (m3)

Evironmental_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require environment study.
Evironmental_Safeguard.Reason: This project is on the existing road and in the village.

Land_Safeguard.Impact: This project required land acquisition report.Voluntary

Highland_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require highland people report.
Highland_Safeguard.Reason: The village has no high land people resided.

projects.project_name: Laterite road construction and single pipe culvert.
